short_description: penny homes is a home builders & renovation contractor based in taupō, new zealand.
long_description: penny homes offers a variety of land and home packages, designing unique environments within subdivisions in the bay of plenty region and wellington. our designs sit in harmony with the landscape and show case common themes without compromising individual style. forward planning ensures that every ome respects the surrounds and theme of its subdivision and delivers a form of sophisticated living rarely experienced. where possible view shafts are protected, sun and courtyard spaces are optimised and a full landscape theme is completed. our expertise in this area provides a total "turn key" solution and guarantees that your package will maximise your investment. penny homes offers a complete design and build service, allowing our experienced team to provide you with a new home solution that is uniquely created for you - a home which reflects your lifestyle needs, budget and section requirements. our wellington region has subdivisions in newlands and kelson with a show home to visit in cromwell point, seagrove, wellington. the show home in kelson is due for completion in july 2010. two different areas and very different looks.
business_tags: real estate | sophisticated living | building services | house & land
generated_description: penny homes is a company that offers a range of land and home packages in the bay of plenty region and wellington. they specialize in designing unique environments within subdivisions, ensuring that their designs are in harmony with the landscape and showcase common themes without compromising individual style. their forward planning ensures that each home respects the surrounding area and delivers a sophisticated living experience. they prioritize protecting view shafts, optimizing sun and courtyard spaces, and completing a full landscape theme. with their expertise in this area, they provide a total "turn key" solution to maximize investment and offer a complete design and build service. penny homes has subdivisions in newlands and kelson in the wellington region, with a show home to visit in cromwell point, seagrove, wellington, with the kelson show home due for completion in july 2010.

short_description: penny homes is a home builders & renovation contractor based in taupō district, new zealand.
long_description: building communities for kiwis. building a house is a journey that links architectural vision, smart design, and lifestyle needs. as registered master builders, penny homes has joined with home owners countrywide for over 25 years to build homes to suit all budgets and circumstance. every new building project has its own creative footprint – from modern house plans, to house and land packages, to high-end architectural homes. we're one of new zealand's leading home building companies – we know that successful home design is about meeting the wants, needs and lifestyle of the people within it. whatever your new home design requirements – existing plans or starting from scratch – together we'll build a house that fits your brief. whether you want an easy turn-key approach or you need inspiration on layout and style – from urban spaces, to townhouses and executive homes, we deliver home designs to meet the demands of everyday life and provide spaces to relax, work and entertain in. penny homes designed to inspire guide is a complete house designs collection.
business_tags: house plans | house and land packages | home building | home & design | interior finishes | modern house plans | build home | floor planning | first home | custom home designs | design & planning | buildings & houses | project management
generated_description: penny homes, legally known as penny homes ltd., is a new zealand-based home building company, operating primarily in the taupō district, wellington, and auckland. established in 1998, the company specializes in custom home designs, house plans, and house and land packages. as registered master builders, penny homes is recognized for its award-winning work and commitment to quality service and craftsmanship. the family-owned business collaborates with designers, project managers, tradesmen, and consultants to deliver seamless building experiences, from design and planning to construction. penny homes is known for its innovative designs and robust building solutions, catering to a wide range of budgets and lifestyle needs.
